REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f5452 reute r f BC-BUTLER-<BTLR>-TO-BUY 03-17 0061

TEXT.TITLE: BUTLER <BTLR> TO BUY BACK 600,000 SHARES
TEXT.BODY: Butler Manufacturing Co said its board authorized the repurchase of up to 600,000 shares, or 12 pct of its outstanding common stock. It said purchases will be made in open market and private transactions through Kidder, Peabody and Co. Butler currently has 5,001,848 shares outstanding. Reuter
